action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of colorful shapes arranged in a seemingly random pattern. There are two purple squares, one red square, one red T-shape, one yellow plus sign, one yellow U-shape, and one orange T-shape.
continue

DESCRIPTION: The image consists of a series of four different colored shapes arranged in a pattern. The top left shape is a blue cross, the top right shape is a green cross, the bottom left shape is a blue cross, and the bottom right shape is a green cross.
